tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_work_survey_data (
    survey_id INT,
    respondent_id INT,
    remote_work_experience VARCHAR,
    remote_work_preference VARCHAR,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyRespondents (
    respondent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    company VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    remote_work_experience VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    respondent_id INT,
    question_id INT,
    response_value TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_respondent FOREIGN KEY (respondent_id) REFERENCES SurveyRespondents(respondent_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_question FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES SurveyQuestions(question_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    respondent_id INT,
    overall_satisfaction INT,
    work_life_balance_rating INT,
    remote_collaboration_rating INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_respondent_results FOREIGN KEY (respondent_id) REFERENCES SurveyRespondents(respondent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE survey_participants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    participant_id INT,
    question_id INT,
    response TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES survey_participants(id)
)

CREATE TABLE survey_questions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE work_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    preference TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES survey_participants(id)
)

CREATE TABLE work_experiences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    experience TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES survey_participants(id)
)
